summary: Comprehensive E2E testing completed for Spanish trucking platform with enhanced dashboard and chat bot features. All backend APIs working at 100% success rate. Frontend dashboard, navigation, chat widget, map functionality, and filtering systems all working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate)
Stats endpoint with proper data structure
Cargas CRUD operations and individual retrieval
Envios list and structure validation
Transportistas data management
AI Chat integration with GPT-4o and cargo matching
Carga acceptance workflow with real-time stats updates
Dashboard loading and stats display
Quick actions bar functionality (Ver mapa, Publicar carga, etc.)
Filter pills for cargas recomendadas (Todas, Urgente, Completa, Frigorifico)
Stats cards clickable navigation to correct pages
Envios activos section with progress bars
Enhanced chat widget with quick action buttons
Chat quick actions (Urgentes, Madrid, Barcelona, Mejor precio)
Chat AI responses with cargo cards display
Chat cargo card accept buttons functionality
Notification bell and panel functionality
Map page navigation and container loading
Map search and filtering functionality
Envios page with filter tabs (todos, activos, completados)
Transportistas page with search and contact buttons
Complete navigation flow between all pages
Real-time data updates after carga acceptance
